title: Temando API
description: Providing consumers with more choice and lowering the cost of shipping.

methods.title: Get list of Products in the account document.
Create a Product object in the account.
Get shipment from account document by id.

methods.summary: Get list of Products in the account document.

request.description: Get list of Products in the account document.

responses.description: List of all of the Products defined.

properties.name: id
properties.description: GUID of the object.

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: This is the schema for representing product's attributes.

properties.name: merchantProductId
properties.description: The product unique identifier, provided by the merchant

properties.name: sku
properties.description: The sku of this product.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of this product.

properties.name: category
properties.description: The category of this product.

properties.name: unitOfMeasure
properties.description: The unit of measure that describes the product. Should be a value from Measures column at https://www.ups.com/worldshiphelp/WS12/ENU/AppHelp/Codes/Unit_of_Measure_Codes_for_Invoices.htm

properties.name: dimensions
properties.description: This is the schema for representing dimensions

properties.name: unitOfMeasurement
properties.description: The distance unit the dimension's properties are in

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the weight unit

properties.name: unitOfMeasurement
properties.description: The weight unit the value is

properties.name: monetaryValue
properties.description: This is the schema for an representing money

properties.name: amount
properties.description: The amount of the currency

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency the money amount is

properties.name: countryOfOrigin
properties.description: An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 compliant two-letter country code.

properties.name: countryOfManufacture
properties.description: An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 compliant two-letter country code.

properties.name: classificationCodes
properties.description: Classification codes of this product for export.

properties.name: eccn
properties.description: Export Control Classification Number (ECCN).

properties.name: scheduleBinfo
properties.description: Classification code for exporting goods out of the United States.

properties.name: hsCode
properties.description: Harmonized Commodity Description and Coding System.

responses.description: The request schema did not meet the specification.

methods.summary: Get shipment from account document by id.

responses.description: Return the shipment specified by id parameter

properties.name: id
properties.description: Id of the shipment.

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: The Shipment Creation Request Schema

properties.name: pickupAt
properties.description: The expected pickup time

properties.name: expectedAt
properties.description: An expected delivery date-time

properties.name: customerReference
properties.description: A consistent identifier that represents a clients customer

properties.name: name
properties.description: Merchant location name.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of location.

properties.name: address
properties.description: This is the schema for representing an address

properties.name: line
properties.description: (required - fulfill) Lines of the address

properties.name: countryCode
properties.description: An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 compliant two-letter country code.

properties.name: postalCode
properties.description: The post or zip code of this address.

properties.name: locality
properties.description: The locality (i.e city, township) of this address. Some countries do not use this field; their address lines are sufficient to locate an address within a sub-administrative area.

properties.name: dependentLocality
properties.description: The dependent locality (i.e neighbourhood) of this address. When representing a double-dependent locality in Great Britain, includes both the double-dependent locality and the dependent locality,

properties.name: administrativeArea
properties.description: The administrative area of this address, ie. state.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The longitude value of a geocoded address.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The latitude value of a geocoded address.

properties.name: contact
properties.description: This is the schema for representing entity

properties.name: organisationName
properties.description: Organisation name of this entity.

properties.name: personFirstName
properties.description: First name of this entity.

properties.name: personLastName
properties.description: Last name of this entity.

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email of this entity.

properties.name: phoneNumbers
properties.description: List of phone number(s) of this entity

properties.name: nationalIdentificationNumber
properties.description: National identification number of this entity, ie. INSEE code (France)

properties.name: taxIdentificationNumber
properties.description: Tax identification number of this entity, ie. TFN (Australia), TIN (France)

responses.description: Successfully updated the Shipment.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Id of the shipment.

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: The Shipment Creation Request Schema

properties.name: pickupAt
properties.description: The expected pickup time

properties.name: expectedAt
properties.description: An expected delivery date-time

properties.name: customerReference
properties.description: A consistent identifier that represents a clients customer

properties.name: name
properties.description: Merchant location name.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of location.

properties.name: address
properties.description: This is the schema for representing an address

properties.name: line
properties.description: (required - fulfill) Lines of the address

properties.name: countryCode
properties.description: An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 compliant two-letter country code.

properties.name: postalCode
properties.description: The post or zip code of this address.

properties.name: locality
properties.description: The locality (i.e city, township) of this address. Some countries do not use this field; their address lines are sufficient to locate an address within a sub-administrative area.

properties.name: dependentLocality
properties.description: The dependent locality (i.e neighbourhood) of this address. When representing a double-dependent locality in Great Britain, includes both the double-dependent locality and the dependent locality,

properties.name: administrativeArea
properties.description: The administrative area of this address, ie. state.

properties.name: longitude
properties.description: The longitude value of a geocoded address.

properties.name: latitude
properties.description: The latitude value of a geocoded address.

properties.name: contact
properties.description: This is the schema for representing entity

properties.name: organisationName
properties.description: Organisation name of this entity.

properties.name: personFirstName
properties.description: First name of this entity.

properties.name: personLastName
properties.description: Last name of this entity.

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email of this entity.

properties.name: phoneNumbers
properties.description: List of phone number(s) of this entity

properties.name: nationalIdentificationNumber
properties.description: National identification number of this entity, ie. INSEE code (France)

properties.name: taxIdentificationNumber
properties.description: Tax identification number of this entity, ie. TFN (Australia), TIN (France)
